text: That it wouldn't be her fault at all. That she was a lady who, like her Uncle Charles, took the highest pride in keeping her word. I could see another thing," he went on in a lower voice, his sunken black eyes twinkling. "He powerful anxious, poor Mistah Piers. We all know how Balicou Island dangerous to all kind of boats, with those big, big rocks in and out of the water.
